-- | This module provides a function for compiling Elm source code into a
--   Yesod widget.
--   
--   You need to define an instance of <a>YesodElm</a>, which will specify
--   where to find the elm-min.js file.
--   
--   For example:
--   
--   <pre>
--   instance YesodElm App where
--     urlElmJs _ = Right $ "http://link.to/elm-min.js"
--   </pre>
--   
--   or
--   
--   <pre>
--   instance YesodElm App where
--     urlElmJs _ = Left $ StaticR js_elm_min_js
--   </pre>
--   
--   A full example implementation is provided in the examples folder of
--   the Elm github repository at
--   <a>https://github.com/tazjin/Elm/tree/master/Examples/elm-yesod</a>.
module Language.Elm.Yesod

-- | elmWidget returns a Yesod widget from some Elm source code with URL
--   interpolation.
elmWidget :: (Yesod master, YesodElm master) => ElmUrl (Route master) -> GWidget sub master ()
class YesodElm master
urlElmJs :: YesodElm master => a -> Either (Route master) Text

-- | Return type of template-reading functions.
type ElmUrl url = (url -> [(Text, Text)] -> Text) -> Elm
instance (Yesod master, YesodElm master, render ~ RenderFn (Route master)) => ToWidget sub master (render -> Elm)
